obese_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
obese_quotes.quote: obese 0 What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

obese_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
obese_quotes.quote: obese 1 Believe in yourself. You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.

obese_quotes.author: Maya Angelou
obese_quotes.quote: obese 2 I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.

obese_quotes.author: Les Brown
obese_quotes.quote: obese 3 Your ability to communicate is an important tool in your pursuit of your goals, whether it is with your family, your co-workers or your clients and customers.

obese_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
obese_quotes.quote: obese 4 You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

overweight_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
overweight_quotes.quote: overweight 0 Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

overweight_quotes.author: Albert Einstein
overweight_quotes.quote: overweight 1 Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.

overweight_quotes.author: Steve Jobs
overweight_quotes.quote: overweight 2 Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.

overweight_quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
overweight_quotes.quote: overweight 3 The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.

overweight_quotes.author: Winston Churchill
overweight_quotes.quote: overweight 4 Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

normalweight_quotes.author: Jim Rohn
normalweight_quotes.quote: normal weight 0 Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become.

normalweight_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
normalweight_quotes.quote: normal weight 1 The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.

normalweight_quotes.author: Tony Robbins
normalweight_quotes.quote: normal weight 2 The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

normalweight_quotes.author: Brian Tracy
normalweight_quotes.quote: normal weight 3 The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.

normalweight_quotes.author: Henry Ford
normalweight_quotes.quote: normal weight4 Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.

underweight_quotes.author: Jim Rohn
underweight_quotes.quote: underweight 0 Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become.

underweight_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
underweight_quotes.quote: underweight 1 The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.

underweight_quotes.author: Tony Robbins
underweight_quotes.quote: underweight 2 The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

underweight_quotes.author: Brian Tracy
underweight_quotes.quote: underweight 3 The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.

underweight_quotes.author: Henry Ford
underweight_quotes.quote: underweight 4 Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
